sourcesContent:
<template>
  <list-house :query="query" />
</template>

<script>
export default {
  components: {
    ListHouse: () => import("@/components/ListHouse")
  },
  data() {
    return {
      query: {
        indice: "Home",
        query: {
          bool: {
            must: [
              {
                match: {
                  _type: "Home"
                }
              },
              {
                match: {
                  isActive: 1
                }
              }
            ]
          }
        }
      }
    };
  },
  methods: {
    formatPrice(value) {
      let val = (value / 1).toFixed().replace(".", ",");
      return val.toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ".");
    },
    callAPI(homeId) {
      let vm = this;
      return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
        vm.$axios
          .get(
            `http://localhost:8080/booking/api/v1/image/com.booking.model.Home/` +
              homeId
          )
          .then(function(response) {
            resolve(response.data.data);
          })
          .catch(err => {
            reject(err);
          });
      });
    },
    searchAPI() {
      let vm = this;
      let keywordSearch = vm.search;
      vm.loading = true;
      var query = {
        indice: "Home",
        query: {
          bool: {
            must: [
              {
                match: {
                  _type: "Home"
                }
              },
              {
                match: {
                  isActive: 1
                }
              }
            ]
          }
        }
      };
      if (keywordSearch) {
        query = {
          indice: "Home",
          query: {
            bool: {
              must: [
                {
                  match: {
                    _type: "Home"
                  }
                },
                {
                  match: {
                    isActive: 1
                  }
                },
                {
                  match: {
                    name: keywordSearch
                  }
                }
              ]
            }
          }
        };
      }
      vm.$axios
        .post(`http://localhost:8080/booking/api/v1/_search`, query)
        .then(async response => {
          vm.homes = [];
          for (let home of response.data.hits.hits) {
            let image = await vm.callAPI(home._source.homeId);
            home._source.avt =
              "http://localhost:8080/booking/images/" + image[0];
            vm.homes.push(home);
          }
          vm.loading = false;
        })
        .catch(err => {
          console.log(err);
        });
    }
  },
  created: function() {
    let vm = this;
    var query = {
      indice: "Home",
      query: {
        bool: {
          must: [
            {
              match: {
                _type: "Home"
              }
            },
            {
              match: {
                isActive: 1
              }
            }
          ]
        }
      }
    };
    vm.$axios
      .post(`http://localhost:8080/booking/api/v1/_search`, query)
      .then(async response => {
        for (let home of response.data.hits.hits) {
          let image = await vm.callAPI(home._source.homeId);
          home._source.avt = "http://localhost:8080/booking/images/" + image[0];
          vm.homes.push(home);
        }
      })
      .catch(err => {
        console.log(err);
      });
  }
};
</script>

<style>
.home-preview .my-12 {
  margin-top: 0 !important;
  margin-bottom: 0 !important;
}
</style>
